1.desc: This skin can be activated by a full body of [rUnique Equipment] or higher rarity (except Orbs)
1.desc2: This skin is activated and can be equipped

2.desc: This skin can be activated by a full body of [yLegendary Equipment] (except Orbs)
2.desc2: This skin is activated and can be equipped

3.desc: After level 30, it consumes 100 Holyfire to unlock, and already has {@1:} Holyfire
3.desc2: It has been activated, you can upgrade this skin in the [r【Role】]-[r【Stigmata】] interface

4.desc: This skin can be activated by a full body of [rEpic Equipment] or higher rarity (except Orbs)
4.desc2: This skin is activated and can be equipped

5.desc: Activate this skin for the No.1- No.3 in the [rAncient Arena] season settlement [r(valid for 1 week after distribution)]
5.desc2: This skin is activated and can be equipped

6.desc: This skin can be activated by receiving the rewards of the [rFirst Charge]
6.desc2: This skin is activated and can be equipped
